entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JSON deserialization fails for documents with schema #79059
    Future
  • [Question] JIT codegen difference between 6.0 and 7.0 for BitOperations.Log2_uint #79058
  • XmlBinaryReader.ReadElementContentAsDouble() double.NaN deserialization issue .net7 #79056
  • Wire the bootstrap build for illink #79054
    8.0.0
  • System.Runtime work planned for .NET 8 #79053
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.Pipes.Tests.NamedPipeTest_CurrentUserOnly_Windows.Connection_UnderDifferentUsers_BehavesAsExpected test failure #79052
  • [wasm] `dotnet-runtime-perf` - OOM on `Perf_File.ReadAllBytes` with `size=100M` #79047
    8.0.0
  • Private enumeration type can not be recognized when converted to dynamic #79045
  • [mono] Failing test ApplyUpdateTests.AsyncMethodChanges #79043
    8.0.0
  • Does MAUI not trust Android user-added root CAs? #79041
    8.0.0
  • ILCompiler --make-repro-path improvements #79032
    8.0.0
  • On Windows File.CreateSymbolicLink method does not create a working symlink in case the pathToTarget parameter is a relative path with forward slashes #79031
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort has no IntelliSense documentation #79030
  • [mono][interp] Speed up invoke path #79029
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Allow source generated logging methods to receive a scope parameter #79028
    Future
  • Http Client every first time response slow if publish single file with self-contained #79023
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Remainder example fails for LLVMFullAot #79022
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal] Expose `System.String` static methods as string extensions #79020
    Future
  • CodeGen infrastructure work planned for .NET 8 #79018
    8.0.0
  • superpmi: add libraries test run collection #79017
    8.0.0
  • Change trimming workaround for Linq.Expressions usage of custom operators #79016
  • superpmi: add real world benchmarks collection #79015
    8.0.0
  • Add tests for MSBuild tasks in `src/tasks` #79010
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [wasm] Compilation with WasmBuildNative fails with dependency containing hyphen in the name #78992
    8.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.101] System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException: 'Ambiguous match found.' #78938
    7.0.2
  • Builds fails with `exited with code 1` with no apparent error #76906
  • `dotnet build` returns exit code `1` even when the build passes #74328
    8.0.0
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Multiple `JIT.*` runtime test failures on rolling builds #75391
    8.0.0
  • How to identify HttpClient connect timeout errors? #78070
  • Crash in HttpListener during application teardown due to bad safehandle handling #78326
  • CI Linux failure: SyncHttpHandler_HttpProtocolTests_Dribble.GetAsync_ResponseHasNormalLineEndings_Success #76678
  • ssl certificate processing logic error #78957
  • Socket support for TCP_QUICKACK #798
    Future
  • DualModeAcceptAsync.AcceptAsyncV*BountTo* tests failed with TimeoutException #22620
    Future
  • Tests failed: System.Net.Sockets.Tests.DnsEndPointTest / * #21924
    Future
  • Add variations of SocketTestServer to increase test coverage in System.Net.Sockets.Tests #19952
    Future
  • DualModeAcceptAsync.AcceptAsyncV6BoundToAnyV4_CantConnect failed in CI #19162
    Future
  • Native crash in `System.Xml.XmlSchema.XmlSchemaValidatorApi.Tests` #64719
    Future
  • Generate Unsafe Span code for most of the looping #78981
  • Encoding between Internal.Console.Write and SystemNative_Log not aligned for iOS #78971
  • System.Text.Json source generator fails if [Required(ErrorMessage = "...")] attribute is present. #62937
    6.0.x
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 9 Regressions on 11/18/2022 7:31:41 AM #78827
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 5 Regressions on 11/19/2022 1:29:52 AM #78822
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 5 Regressions on 11/19/2022 1:29:52 AM #78837
  • Will JsonSerializer support parsing to existing object? #29538
    Future
  • Setting the TCP keep alive for an HttpClient should be significantly simpler #77755
  • System.Net.Http.Unit.Tests failing under jitstress #78912
    8.0.0
  • [Android] SSLStream throws 'Handshake has already been started' on API level 26 #78716
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IndexOfAnyValues<T>.Contains(T) #78722
    8.0.0
  • superpmi: add coreclr test run collection #47543
    8.0.0
  • EventPipe sessions can leak the EventPipeThreadSessionState* associated with them #76430
    8.0.0
  • CoreCLR failed to run tests on with MSVC on windows according to runtime/docs/workflow documentation #36869
    Future
  • [SuperPMI] Store the MCH file in azure storage using the JIT-EE GUID #11842
    Future
  • [SuperPMI] When running superpmi emit the amount of bytes for methods with no-diff #13322
    Future
  • Allow loading COM components in default ALC #79012
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Interpreter assertion failure for `System.Xml.RW.XmlWriterApi.Tests` with *AOT* #78358
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Increase size of Number's small numbers cache, and make it lazy #79061
  • Remove getFieldAddress #79060
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Move AT_EXECFN to fallback for /proc/self/exe #79057
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 7.0.x
  • Avoid caching compilation data and use value equality for SyntaxNodes #79051
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Split #79048
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [hot_reload] Enable some CustomAttributes tests on Mono; new issue for async #79044
    area-EnC-mono
  • Small ConfigurationBinder Cleanup #79042
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [release/7.0] [Android] Remove repeated calls to beginHandshake #79040
    area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Remove repeated calls to beginHandshake #79039
    area-System.Net.Security
  • initial support for '@' symbol in message template #79038
  • Improve "one asg morphing" and move it to `morphblock.cpp` #79037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Update a few dependencies #79036
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable loading COM component in default ALC via runtime config setting #79026
    area-Host
  • Experiment with changing the implementation strategy for RangeListMap #79021
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add faster DAC EnumMemoryRegion option with less memory usage #79014
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Handle zero value modulus for OpenSSL 1.1 #79013
    area-System.Security
  • Remaining feedback part1 #79011
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [Release/7.0] Don't emit manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource (#78213) #79009
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [Release/6.0] Don't emit manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource (#78213) #79008
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.14

Merged

  • [wasm] Correctly escape library names when generating symbols for .c #79007
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in Uri.EscapeString helper #79024
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix configuration binding with types implementing IDictionary<,> #79019
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.2
  • Delete DOTNET_CLI_DO_NOT_USE_MSBUILD_SERVER workarounds #79035
    area-Infrastructure
  • Move AT_EXECFN to fallback for /proc/self/exe #78958
    area-Host, community-contribution, 7.0.x
  • [wasm][mt] making JSImport work on worker thread #78847
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add readmes for System.Runtime, System.Runtime.Numerics, System.Buffers, System.Runtime.Intrinsics #77332
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Enable basic Kept validation in NativeAOT running linker tests #78828
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Consolidate approach for conditional tests that check for privileged processes #78793
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • [Release/6.0][PERF] Fix perf repo branch setup target, tool build, and mono-dotnet create #78411
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.13
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in ArchivingUtils #79025
    area-System.IO.Compression, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix Vector128 divide by scalar #78784
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix issue with last_gc_before_oom flag being reset by intervening gen 1 GC. #78973
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Android] Remove repeated calls to beginHandshake #78849
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • [Android] Prevent exceptions with a 'Success' message in System.Net.NetworkInformation #78555
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Disable APICompat assembly validation in source build #79027
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Transform `STRUCT`-typed uses of primitives in local morph #78131
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Internal.Console.Write uses unicode encoding for iOS #78974
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add .NET 7 source gen regression tests #78857
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Update to the stable 7.0.100 SDK #78034
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix initblk/cpblk and STORE_DYN_BLK size mismatch #78930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] ActiveIssue: JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskTypes - System.ObjectDisposedException #78976
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Don't gitignore linker #79002
  • Place non-GC statics in the dehydratable section #78795
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Place frozen objects into dehydrated section #78688
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Place dispatch cells in dehydrated section #78748
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add IndexOfAnyValues.Contains #78996
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix compiling EXE modules as native libraries #78949
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix configuration binding with types implementing IDictionary<,> #78946
    area-Extensions-Configuration

Updated

  • Remove FILEDosToUnixPathA conversion #78995
    breaking-change, area-PAL-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Implement a heuristic for using fast-path serialization in streaming JsonSerializer methods. #78646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Remove instances of `%S` #78894
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fold some HW nodes for constant input #78929
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Support GT_SELECT on xarch #78879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2057077 #78677
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Disallow `IND<struct>` except as a source of `STORE_DYN_BLK` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Wasm jiterpreter cleanup and bug fixes pt. 3 #78782
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [draft][wasm] Memory snapshot #78915
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Remove mono specific SpanHelpers #78015
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Use TaskDialog for error dialog in Windows GUI apps #78087
    area-Host
  • [Android] Fix SslStream on Android API 21-23 #78918
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix repro package creation #78924
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Throw invalid program if stack state is invalid #73215
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Allow inlining in some over-bugdet cases #78874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Double IndexOf throughput for chars #78861
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Add AVX2 support to IndexOfAnyValues #78863
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not overallocate SocketAddress.Buffer #78860
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - `CAST` removals for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] - Fix blocking CI IL test #78999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify BufferedFileStreamStrategy seeking #78984
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-30
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Allow return merging; implement mismatched returns #2104

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge to 17/12/21 #2101
  • Add some perf tests and don't spin-wait on a task when on a green thread #2105
    area-green-threads

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet test does not pass arguments to msbuild when a path to a project is provided #29309
  • Dotnet test in multiplatform docker build #29308
  • Props file adding implicit usings matching using EndsWith on ProjectName doesn't work when xaml files are added #29307
  • dotnet publish with --no-build broken after dotnet 7 SDK upgrade #29296
  • CLI parsing error in .net 7 handling #29295

Closed

  • Default `.editorconfig` not aligned with other templates (e.g. file scoped namespaces) #29306

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2057227 #29319
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update target framework version in toolsetinfo for NET 8. #29316
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29314
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #29313
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add NextTargetFramework support for next TF #29297

Merged

  • Add PackageDependenciesDesignTime to cache assets file #28405
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Update man pages post 7.0 GA #29032
  • Update .NET Framework reference assemblies version #29310
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #29290
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #29127
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29132
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Don't Infer RID outside of dotnet publish for PublishSingleFile/PublishAot #29031
    area-runtime, Document for breaking changes, Area-CLI, Area-SingleFile, Area-NativeAOT
  • Add optional logging to MSBuild SDK Resolver #26904
  • Add error when failing to resolve SDK with workload sdk resolver #27432
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29158
  • Update the correct nuget.config file and remove a bunch of extra sources #29288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add RidSpecific, Make Apps RID Specific By Default & RID Now FDD By Default in 8.0+ #28412
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Conversion operator clashes with the explicit impls #65685
    17.5
  • Intellisense switch expression produces invalid code from `not` pattern #65683
  • Pattern matching over generic requires C# 8.0 instead of C# 7.1 #65682
    Backlog
  • Add tests for incremental member edit analysis #65678

Closed

  • Code Analysis constantly crashes (IndexOutOfRangeException) #64266
    17.4
  • NotNull annotation warning for parameter even though it's checked for null #65684
  • Fully-Qualify fixer serializes symbols as part of normal processsing. #65652
  • C# compiler does not provide a warning about unused lambda variables #22921
    Backlog
  • The `SyntaxGenerator` class does not generate default values for parameters of member/constructor/operator. #65638

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify and clarify code around diagnostic modes. #65689
    Area-IDE
  • Add option to enable/disable document outline and disable by default #65688
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65687
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix incorrect duplicate conversion #65686
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Move IDS_XXX checks out of the parser. #65679
    Area-Compilers
  • [LSP] Find refs - Remove bogus assert and add test #65675
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • [Infra] Merge main to release/dev17.5 #65673
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65666
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65667
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65657
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add feature flag to allow diagnostic tagging to be either push or pull. #65671
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [LSP] Don't throw when changed member is not a method member #65676
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Revert "Merge pull request #63858 from CyrusNajmabadi/pullDiags" #65538
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing
  • View Call Hierarchy - fix thread block (#65452) #65574
    Area-IDE
  • Port #65083 to release/dev17.4 branch #65576
    Area-Analyzers, OnDeckForServicing
  • Do all work for the 'fully qualify' fixer out of process. #65665
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [Infra] 17.5 P2 snap #65674
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65677
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • [Infra] Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65672
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix generation of parameter symbols with explicit default values #65639
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move SRM to 6.0.1 #65416
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65691
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65587
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix stale inline diagnostics #65571
    Area-IDE
  • Implement a new brokered service for passing project information #65592
    Area-IDE
  • Allow optional and `params` parameters in synthesized delegate templates #65582
    Area-Compilers
  • Consider delegate default parameter values and `params` in symbol matcher #65579
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #65642
    Area-Compilers
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #65606
    Area-Compilers
  • Cleanup keyword recommender tests #65664
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine ServerComparison.FunctionalTests.HelloWorldTests.HelloWorld #45378
    Test failures
  • XAML in Blazor SERVER side #45377
  • Model Binding Support for TimeOnly and DateOnly #45376
  • Force HTTPS Redirect URIs for all Oauth flows #45374
  • [Minimal APIs] async handlers with single `HttpContext` parameter are not working #45373
  • OpenIdConnect in version 7.0.0 is targeting only .net core 7.0 #45370
  • SignalR Client Windows Authentication returning 401Unautorized (update 6.0.11 -> 7.0.0) #45371
  • [API Proposal]: Add SkipStatusCodePages property to ApiBehaviorOptions #45369
  • SIGTERM signal in .NET 6 app deployed in azure Kubernetes service is not triggered #45366
  • [Minimal API] Incorrect OpenAPI definition of path, query and header parameters when there is a body and we're using WithOpenApi extension method #45365
  • Using angular template project. Running "ng serve" independently fails when trying to proxy request to dotnet. #45364
    8.0-preview1
  • [signalr-client-c++] Client send access_token in Qtcreator #45363
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_nodejs #45361
  • Add support for `Finally`-like API to WebApplicationBuilder #45360
  • Remove/replace virtual method in UserManager.cs constructor #45358

Closed

  • System.InvalidOperationException: Unable to build IHost with Minimal API on ASP.NET 6 #45252
  • Typed results (such as Created<T>) do not emit type discriminator from attribute-based polymorphic serialization introduced in .NET 7 #45357
  • Quickgrid Virtualize=true using Memory data not displaying entire data #45326
  • Unable to read request body after request.EnableBuffering #45340
  • WebApplicationFactory Client returns NotFound for all requests with Overriding Configure method #45372
  • Add SkipStatusCodePages flag to ApiBehaviorOptions #45260
  • Document migration process for SPA projects #44600
    8.0-MQ
  • Rare "The SSL connection could not be established, see inner exception. Unable to read data from the transport connection: An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host.. An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host." #45266
  • Blazor Baselines have hardcoded runtime version #44226
    8.0-MQ
  • Add an Analyzer to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #41362
    Backlog
  • There is a performance issue with WeatherForecastController.cs #45353
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Quarantine HelloWorld #45379
    area-runtime
  • Add Logging to AuthenticationService Scripts #45375
    area-blazor
  • Allow concurrent accept (improve connection-accept performance) #45367
    area-runtime
  • Fix w3c Issue with unit test #45362
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Avoid allocations from getting JsonOptions in Minimal #45359
    Perf, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Automate setting milestone for servicing PRs when merged #45356
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Infer parameter source from ElementType for IEnumerable #45256
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks
  • Add analyzer and code fix to recommend against IHeaderDictionary.Add #44463
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Use new Arm64 Helix queues #45121
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Centralize well known types across analyzers #45314
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22580.8 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261
  • Add DateOnly and TimeOnly to MVC Model Binding #45243
    blocked, area-web-frameworks
  • Reimplement the default object pool for improved performance #45251
    Perf, area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2056969 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Warn the user if they're specifying protocols that won't be used #45352
    area-runtime
  • Get EmptyHttpResult in RDF via reflection #45354
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Code analyzer to detect if route parameters are parsable #45286
    area-infrastructure
  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Support deserializing non-nested enum from string #45273
    area-grpc
  • Add Kestrel named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Text present in the image loses quality when the image view is resized #11772
  • EvaluateJavaScriptAsync null reference if undefined returned on Android #11770
  • iOS Thickness should be multiple to 2 #11769
  • IsEnabled currently unsettable on MenuFlyoutItem and MenuSubFlyoutItem #11767
    Backlog
  • DisplayAlert not working on MacCatalyst and UWP #11766
    Backlog
  • ScrollView doesn't work in the Shell Flyout Header #11764
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Review setting IsAccessibilityElement to true scenarios #11762
    Backlog
  • Problem Geocoding Address #11756
  • Button.ContentLayout="Right, xx" does not work inside of an HorizontalStackLayout #11755
  • Navigation after file share intent is not working #11754
    Backlog
  • No iPhone simulators show in vs for mac stable version #11753
  • Could not deploy iOS app from VS for Mac stable version #11752
  • Scaling of root VisualElement is ignored #11751
    Backlog
  • Height Request of Frame not working in Android #11750
  • Image does not load a specific URI only on Android and UWP platform. #11749
    Backlog
  • Carousel view selection and scrolling is not working perfectly in any platform. #11748
    Backlog
  • iOS Radio Button displays with same black coloring in Dark Mode #11747
  • Have easy way to set initial BlazorWebView URL #11746
    8.0-preview1

Closed

  • [Windows] Shell FlyoutIcon doesn't change the hamburger Icon for Flyout #7667
  • Shell: Flyout menu items are missing in MAUI windows #9103
  • PushModalAsync ignored at application startup #11745
    Backlog
  • PushModalAsync method does not respond in OnAppearing method #7478
  • Is `AppDomain.CurrentDomain.ProcessExit` supposed to work on macOS (maccatalyst)? #11676
  • TapGestureRecognizer on label in default ControlStyle not working #11705
  • Disabling a MenuBarItem doesn't stop its sub-items from appearing when clicked #11602
    Backlog
  • [Enhancement] Accessible RadioButton #1002
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Stacklayout leaves layout space for items whose IsVisible=false #11678
    Backlog
  • Element.ChildRemoved event has wrong sender #11720
    Backlog
  • [MAUI-Windows] Unhandled layout cycle exception occurs when setting "IsVisible = False" inside FlexLayout #9377
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Windows] TabbedPage inside NavigationPage TopBar fighting #8011
  • [Android] Toolbar item icon and text disappears when reopening from recent applications. #11552
  • Adding 365 Views in a Grid takes forever #7916
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add API changes doc #11768
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [net8.0] Run dotnet format #11761
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [main] Update PublicAPI.Shipped.txt files #11760
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Update PublicAPI.Shipped.txt files #11759
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net6.0] Fix up the Shipped/Unshipped APIs #11758
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Build] Add maestro-changelog workflow action #11757
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [Windows] Correctly disable MenuBarItems #11695
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, control-menubar
  • Fix Element.ChildRemoved event sender #11741
    community ✨
  • Ensure invisible views don't get rows/columns when generating AndExpand layouts #11712
  • [WinUI] Fix RefreshView crash if no content is specified #11735
  • [7.0-sr1] Fix up the Shipped/Unshipped APIs #11737
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [6.0-sr8] Fix up the Shipped/Unshipped APIs #11732
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Don't set editor action to handled #11739
    area/controls 🎮

Updated

  • Add `FrameRenderer` to all our existing tests and then resolve found issues #10751
  • Only add PointerGesture if PointerOver VisualState exists #11591
    area/gestures
  • [Android] Invalidate Button background drawable if size changes #11604
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Allow Button.ImageSource to be updated on Android, iOS and macOS #11008
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix shadows size in clipped views #11603
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Correctly render ContentPage brushes background #11721
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • [Tizen] Add missing Shell features in Tizen #11597
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • [windows] ReadyToRun packages ahead of time #11744
    platform/windows 🪟, area/perf 🏎️
  • Update WebAuthenticator to support custom ResponseDecoder (#11641) #11710
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Enable parallel builds back #10420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Make inline video / picture in picture enabled by default on WebView for iOS #11075
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/TabbedPage

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF7 reverse engineering missing HasForeignKey vs. EF6 #29721
  • Add overload to ToListAsync with an initial capacity. #29720
  • Enable non-tracking for specific Entity #29719
  • Union with .SelectMany is not translated #29718
  • T4 template removes implicit usings #29713
  • In reverse engineering,Use Precision(18, 2) instead of Column(TypeName = "decimal(18, 2)") #29711
  • Add comments to the DbSet and Navigation in the T4 template #29710

Closed

  • T4 - How to change file names #29700
  • Cannot access a disposed context instance. #29660
  • add-migration throw ： Value cannot be null. (Parameter 'key') #29649
  • Suppress logging commands from save changes. #29696
  • Insert data as array object to mediator #29712
  • Exception when inserting multiple rows into the same table on SQL Server #29502
    7.0.x
  • Issue Running EF Core Bundle in DevOps Pipeline #29641
  • SQLite Error 11: database disk image is malformed #29630
  • On removal of a migration, the .HasDicriminator command is not recreated in the ContextModelSnapshot #29607
  • [EF Core 6 + OData] Calculate total count: Nullable object must have a value exception #29566
  • Mirosoft.Data.Sqlite 7.0, System.TypeInitializationException thrown when load Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.dll from embeded resource #29526
  • EF 7.0.0 TPH migration fails with System.InvalidOperationException #29715
  • Nullable object must have a value within Entity Framework Core 6.0 #29691
  • Enable JsonColumn JSON_UNESCAPED_UNICODE #29699
  • HasPrecision overrides precision set in explicit store type #29600
    8.0.0
  • Can we make IEntityType.DynamicallyAccessedMemberTypes and constants alike public? #29714
  • SQLite: Exception when using enum on entity #29521
    8.0.0
  • SQL Server bulk insert broken when new command applies pending commands and goes over the batch parameter limit #29539

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Fix SQL Server bulk insert edge case (#29669) #29717
    Servicing-consider
  • Sequence cache support #29716

Merged

  • SQLite: Use infix GLOB and REGEXP operators #23193
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #29709
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #29708
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Ensure that facets specified in the store type name take precedence #29628
  • Remove s from AppendInsertAndSelectOperations #29678
  • SQLite type mapping should not be returned without converter when CLR type does not match #29633
  • Fix SQL Server bulk insert edge case #29669
  • Support interfaces and entities with owned types in ExecuteUpdate setter property lambda #29672
  • [release/7.0] Use simpler Docker tags #29576
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/6.0] Use simpler Docker tags #29575
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Updated

  • Fix bug where a non-sproc command comes before a sproc command #29680
  • Fix to #28648 - Json/Query: translate element access of a json array #29656
  • [release/2.1] Update to SQLitePCLRaw 2.1.2 #29433
  • Thanksgiving project: lookup entities by primary key, alternate key, or foreign key #29686

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • After installing VS 17.4, I can't run `dotnet watch` for .NET6 projects #15067

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #15070

Merged

Updated

  • improve format of productCommits file #15036
